H0.text: which states does the colorado river run through. Arizona

H1.text: which states does the colorado river run through. California

H2.text: which states does the colorado river run through. Nevada

H3.text: which states does the colorado river run through. Utah

A4.text: The Colorado River flows through Arizona, as it is mentioned as one of the states in the basin extending into... most of Arizona.

A5.text: The Colorado River flows through California, as it is part of the basin extending into southeastern Nevada and California.

A6.text: The Colorado River drains much of southern Nevada.

A7.text: The Colorado River flows through Utah, as it is mentioned in the context of creating terrain in the state.
